songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well as this cold world, turns round and round
So much tragedy, have I found
If I could take it away, i'd do that now
Cause only in my dreams, can I smile
So if I go to sleep, don't wake me up
Cause only in my dreams

[Hook]
Can I fly away!
(x4)
Fly away

[Verse 2]
So god bless my soul
The pain I feel won't nobody know
Cause this world is evil
And everytime I wake up I wanna go home
So what am I to do, but sing a song for you
Cause I feel you also
That's why i'll never let you go
They say I lost my mind, but I did that so long ago
So when I close my eyes, leave me alone

So if I go to sleep
Don't wake me up
Cause only in my dreams

[Hook]
(x4)

[Verse 3]
Somebody pray for me
I believe I can fly, ya, crazy me
But at night these angels be singing to me
Like lalalalalalalalala
So as I lay awake at night
I drift away into the sky
And that's where I reside
So pray that i'll be just fine
I see you when it's time
I'll see you when it's time

[Verse 4]
Well as this cold world, turns round and round
So much tragedy, have I found
If I could take it away, i'd do that now
Cause only in my dreams, can I smile
So if I go to sleep, don't wake me up
Cause only in my dreams

[Hook]
(x4)

[Verse 5]
So god bless my soul
The pain I feel won't nobody know
Cause this world is evil
And everytime I wake up I wanna go home
So what am I to do, but sing a song for you
Cause I feel you also
That's why i'll never let you go
They say I lost my mind, but I did that so long ago
So when I close my eyes, leave me alone

[Chrous]
So if I go to sleep
Don't wake me up
Cuz only in my dreams
Can I fly away
Fly away
(x3)
songs.title: Can I Fly
